page.topic: Set the PhoneGap Ajax Callback URL Dynamically at Runtime
page.description: When you build a PhoneGap application you have to specify the URL for Ajax callbacks in the PhoneGap genie.

discussion.p: When you perform any action in your PhoneGap application, the callback is made to the server address specified in the URL for Ajax callbacks property in the PhoneGap genie.

However, you might be building an app where you don't know what server the app will be running on (i.e. you don't know what server the app will be making its Ajax callbacks to) and so you would like to be able to set the URL for Ajax callbacks after the app has loaded.
Here is how this can be done.
